text: Hi all!  We’re just getting started with using the dnd page editor using the boilerplate template. It doesn’t appear that I can adjust the column sizes in the editor.  Is that a known bug?  After moving items around it also appears that there are some visual issues with the column handles.  Anyone else experienced that?
:wave: mind sending me a link to the page in editor in question so I can take a peek?
Mark, mind if I make a quick tweak to the template this page uses? I think I spot _one_ of the issues

(it looks like on line 51 in the template you need an `is_json=True` attribute). I can see this is causing the editor to throw an exception on column resize. Not sure if it’s the reason it’s not working, but it could be one of them
Hi Brian…. Sorry I’ve been in and out today
you’re welcome to make changes.  I took what you see there directly from the boiler plate github repo
I also tried distilling it down on this page <https://app.HubSpot.com/content/5091472/edit/12796493674/content> and it has it’s own issues.
